overview: Tizeta is a cheerful and bright little girl full of ambitions adored by both her parents. She gets diagnosed with a heart condition that seeks fast treatment. Time is  ticking and her parents fail to find adequate financial and community support.  Dirdir is a story of an ordinary dad that takes extraordinary measures to save his daughter's life.
tagline: How far does one go to save a loved one's life?
title: Dirdir
